item.title: JavaScript Weekly #570
item.description:
# The Best of JavaScript Weekly inÂ 2021

This is the last issue of the year (we're back on January 7, 2022) so we're taking a look back at some of the most popular items of 2021, starting with top links overall before moving on to top libraries, tools, videos, and more. You'll also find a quick month by month rundown in this issue, so there's sure to be something that'll catch your attention ğŸ˜ƒ
____
Peter Cooper, your editor
